1001.name: ErrGetLatestReleasesCode
1001.long_description: Unable to get the latest release info from the GithubAPI

1011.name: ErrSampleAppCode
1011.long_description: Error occurred while trying to install a sample application using manifests
1011.suggested_remediation: Reconnect your adapter to meshery server to refresh the kubeclient

1012.name: ErrCustomOperationCode
1012.long_description: Error occurred while applying custom manifest to the cluster
1012.suggested_remediation: Make sure to apply a valid Kubernetes manifest

1017.name: ErrParseLinkerdCoreComponentCode
1017.short_description: linkerd core component manifest parsing failing

1018.name: ErrParseOAMComponentCode
1018.long_description: Error occurred while parsing application component in the OAM request made by Meshery server
1018.probable_cause: Could not unmarshall configuration component received via ProcessOAM gRPC call into a valid Component struct
1018.suggested_remediation: Check if Meshery Server is creating valid component for ProcessOAM gRPC call. This error should never happen and can be reported as a bug in Meshery Server. Also check if Meshery Server and adapters are referring to same component struct provided in MeshKit.

1019.name: ErrParseOAMConfigCode
1019.long_description: Error occurred while parsing configuration in the request made by Meshery Server
1019.probable_cause: Could not unmarshall OAM config received via ProcessOAM gRPC call into a valid Config struct
1019.suggested_remediation: Check if Meshery Server is creating valid config for ProcessOAM gRPC call. This error should never happen and can be reported as a bug in Meshery Server. Also, confirm that Meshery Server and Adapters are referring to same config struct provided in MeshKit

1021.name: ErrNilClientCode
1021.suggested_remediation: Reconnect the Meshery Adapter to Meshery Server

1022.name: ErrAddonFromHelmCode
1022.short_description: Error with addon install operation by helm chart
1022.probable_cause:
The helm chart URL in additional properties of addon operation might be incorrect
Could not apply service patch file for the given addon

1023.name: ErrInvalidVersionForMeshInstallationCode
1023.short_description: Invalid version passed for helm based installation
1023.probable_cause: Version might not be prefixed with \"stable-\" or \"edge-\
1023.suggested_remediation:
Version should be prefixed with \"stable-\" or \"edge-\
Version might be empty

1024.name: ErrAnnotatingNamespaceCode
1024.probable_cause:
Could not get the namespace in cluster
Could not update namespace in cluster
1024.suggested_remediation: Make sure the cluster is reachable

1033.name: ErrFetchLinkerdVersionsCode
1033.long_description: versions for linkerd could not be fetched
1033.short_description: could not get any linkerd versions
1033.probable_cause:
could not reach github.com/linkerd/linkerd2
no versions could be fetched from linkerd release page
1033.suggested_remediation: make sure adapter is reachable to github

1103.name: ErrEncodePrivateKeyPEMCode
1103.short_description: Failed to encode private key PEM:

1106.name: ErrGenerateDefaultRootCACode
1106.short_description: Failed to create default Root CA:

1107.name: ErrGetFileNamesCode
1107.short_description: failed to get filenames for dynamic component generation
1107.probable_cause:
The repository could not be cloned or reached
The repository url is invalid
Could not reach the remote git repository
1107.suggested_remediation: Make sure the owner, repo and path is correct for fetching crd names
